title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-webui
summary: A ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, supporting multiple models, code highlighting, and dark/light themes.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama, exposing sync/async clients and streaming support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, providing LLM and embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component to expose Ollama models as conversation agents.

title: ollama-cli
summary: A Rust-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templates and shell integration.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama, supporting chat and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama with Maven Central distribution.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: A Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM apps.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app backed by Ollama, packaged as a single Docker Compose stack.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and modules for NixOS.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generated OpenAPI bindings.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that proxies channel messages to Ollama and posts replies as threads.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for summarizing notes and Q&A.
